languages.text: Отважный торговец, разоренный конкурентами, намерен предпринять военный поход на процветающий мир Керла. Если помочь ему с экспедицией, он обещает поделиться частью добычи с изобилующей рыбой и примитивными аборигенами планеты.

A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.
languages.original_text: Отважный торговец, разоренный конкурентами, намерен предпринять военный поход на процветающий мир Керла. Если помочь ему с экспедицией, он обещает поделиться частью добычи с изобилующей рыбой и примитивными аборигенами планеты.

traits.locale_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

languages.text: Un brave marchand ruiné par ses concurrents compte attaquer Kerlae, un monde fertile regorgeant de poissons et habité par un peuple primitif. Il récompensera toute personne qui l'aidera dans cette entreprise en lui cédant une part du butin.
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

traits.locale_text: Un brave marchand ruiné par ses concurrents compte attaquer Kerlae, un monde fertile regorgeant de poissons et habité par un peuple primitif. Il récompensera toute personne qui l'aidera dans cette entreprise en lui cédant une part du butin.

languages.text: 同業者に破滅させられた勇敢な商人が、魚が豊富で原始的な人々が住む、繫栄した惑星カーレーを攻撃しようとしている。この商人は、この遠征に協力した者に戦利品の分け前を与えるつもりだ。
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

traits.locale_text: 同業者に破滅させられた勇敢な商人が、魚が豊富で原始的な人々が住む、繫栄した惑星カーレーを攻撃しようとしている。この商人は、この遠征に協力した者に戦利品の分け前を与えるつもりだ。

languages.text: 在同行竞争中惨淡出局的某位胆大妄为的商人决定袭击柯尔莱，这个丰饶的世界盛产鱼类，而且当地只有原住民居住。所有协助这次袭击的伙伴，都会得到一部分战利品。
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

traits.locale_text: 在同行竞争中惨淡出局的某位胆大妄为的商人决定袭击柯尔莱，这个丰饶的世界盛产鱼类，而且当地只有原住民居住。所有协助这次袭击的伙伴，都会得到一部分战利品。

languages.text: Un valiente mercader, arruinado por sus competidores, pretende atacar Kerlae, un floreciente mundo rico en peces y habitado por un pueblo primitivo. El mercader pretende recompensar a quien le preste ayuda en esta expedición con una parte del botín.
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

traits.locale_text: Un valiente mercader, arruinado por sus competidores, pretende atacar Kerlae, un floreciente mundo rico en peces y habitado por un pueblo primitivo. El mercader pretende recompensar a quien le preste ayuda en esta expedición con una parte del botín.

languages.text: Ein mutiger Händler, der von seinen Rivalen in den Ruin getrieben wurde, will die florierende Welt Kerlae angreifen, die reich an Fisch ist und von einem primitiven Volk bewohnt wird. Der Kaufmann belohnt jeden, der diese Expedition unterstützt, mit einem Anteil an der Beute.
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.

traits.locale_text: Ein mutiger Händler, der von seinen Rivalen in den Ruin getrieben wurde, will die florierende Welt Kerlae angreifen, die reich an Fisch ist und von einem primitiven Volk bewohnt wird. Der Kaufmann belohnt jeden, der diese Expedition unterstützt, mit einem Anteil an der Beute.

languages.text: Rekabetçileri tarafından batırılan cesur bir tüccar, ilkel insanların yaşadığı Kerlae adındaki dünyaya saldırmayı planlıyor. Tüccar, gelişmekte olan balık zengini gezegenden edineceği ganimetleri bu işte kendisine yardımcı olacak kişilerle paylaşmaya niyet etmiş.
languages.original_text: A brave merchant, ruined by his competitors, intends to attack Kerlae, a flourishing world rich with fish and inhabited by a primitive people. The merchant intends to reward whoever provides assistance with this expedition with a share of the spoils.
